Text: Pro tip:  Don't post anything after the ISBN/product ID number (the part right after /dp/) in Amazon URLs, as that's just bullshit tracking.
I think the abridged version is the only version as an audio book.  If you want the unabridged version you're going to have to read it.
I don't understand. I downloaded it just fine, but now what do I do to listen to it? What to I do?
I'm just going on on a limb here SpeakEasy11 but since they're all mp3's just make a playlist in Windows Media Player or Itunes, then drag all the files over, then play them. Pretty simple.
This book was amazing, thank you so much :)
whats the difference between abridged and unabridged copy?

Abridged means that it was shortened for the format. Normally this is done for time concerns and pacing. From Publishers Weekly review on Amazon "The abridgment keeps the story tight but struggles with the interviewer's narration during interviews."
IT WAS FANTASTIC THAT GOOD THAT I AM GOING TO LISTEN TO IT ALL OVER AGAIN!! THANK YOU GREAT WORK A++
